lore.farworld.cherries: A food that drops in bulk from Cherry Leaves, which can be consumed quickly at any time to restore a slight amount of health and saturation.
lore.farworld.pear: A food that drops from Birch Leaves and can restore a small amount of saturation.
lore.farworld.mystic_pear: An item that can be eaten to grant extra mobility.
lore.farworld.enchanted_mystic_pear: An item that can cause anyone who consumes it to temporarily become the most intrepid explorer. Quite costly.
lore.farworld.allsaw: A rare tool found in Stronghold chests that can mine any block. Alternatively, you can switch it into precision mode, allowing it Silk Touch at the cost of some mining speed.
lore.farworld.brittle_powder: An item that can be used to rapidly grow plants, flowers, and crops at surplus rates. Does not work on saplings.
lore.farworld.gloomspores: This item can be used to brew Potions of Paralysis, or combined with stone tools at a Smithing Table to craft Gloomstone tools.
lore.farworld.geode_fruit: A tasty fruit grown inside the Geode Nuts that can be found on Stonewood trees.
lore.farworld.wishbone: A small, brittle trinket that can teleport you back home once. Can be repaired using Bottles o' Enchanting.
lore.farworld.raw_cobalt: An ore that can be smelted into a Cobalt Ingot.
lore.farworld.cobalt_ingot: A smooth ingot that can be used to craft equipment and utilities.
lore.farworld.soul_steel: An alloy that can be used to upgrade your Iron tools into Soul Steel, granting extra reach.
lore.farworld.breeze_boots: Boots that, when worn, grant extra movement speed.
accessory.item.farworld.obsidian_keepsak: Gain knockback resistance and harm nearby enemies on taking damage
accessory.item.farworld.golem_heart.desc: Knock enemies upwards on hit, then back down into the ground if mid-air for extra fall damage
accessory.item.farworld.blaze_locket.des: Axes light enemies on fire - all weapons deal extra damage
accessory.item.farworld.breeze_ring.desc: Swords inflict Wind Charged - all weapons swing faster
accessory.item.farworld.glittering_aspec: Move substantially faster at full hunger
+10% damage dealt, extra armor, attack faster, Ender Pearls don't harm you, and Endermen are passive
item.farworld.soul_steel_upgrade_smithin: Add iron armor, weapon, or tool
lore.farworld.gloomcap: A highly toxic mushroom found in Dark Forest biomes. Drops Gloomspores unless sheared.
lore.farworld.geode_nut: A form of nut that grows from Stonewood trees. The nut can be roasted to reveal the fruit inside.
lore.farworld.nether_iron_ore: An ore that can be smelted or mined to reveal the Iron inside.
lore.farworld.soul_steel_block: A solid block of Soul Steel.
lore.farworld.flowstone: A smooth block of stone gathered from the Bystone.
lore.farworld.cobbled_flowstone: A cobbled block of stone gathered from the Bystone.
lore.farworld.lush_flowstone: A block of Flowstone with moss growing on one side.
lore.farworld.dense_coal_ore: A densely-packed ore that can be mined with a Stone tool or higher to obtain Coal at surplus rates.
lore.farworld.dense_iron_ore: A densely-packed ore that can be mined with a Stone tool or higher to obtain Iron at surplus rates.
lore.farworld.dense_gold_ore: A densely-packed ore that can be mined with an Iron tool or higher to obtain Gold at surplus rates.
lore.farworld.cobalt_ore: A densely-packed ore that can be mined with an Iron tool or higher to obtain some Cobalt.
lore.farworld.flowstone_cache: A patch of Flowstone chock-full of goodies! Can be mined with a Stone pickaxe or better to obtain Amethyst, Emeralds, or Diamonds.
lore.farworld.stonewood_log: A chopped piece of Stonewood, used in building and crafting.
lore.farworld.stonewood: A chopped piece of Stonewood, used in building and crafting.
lore.farworld.stripped_stonewood_log: A stripped piece of Stonewood covered in bark, used in building and crafting.
lore.farworld.stripped_stonewood: A stripped piece of Stonewood covered in bark, used in building and crafting.
lore.farworld.stonewood_planks: Planks made of Stonewood, used in building and crafting.
lore.farworld.stonewood_leaves_flowered: Flowery leaves from a Stonewood tree.
lore.farworld.hanging_vines_end: Vines grown in the Lush Shallows.
lore.farworld.hanging_flora: Flowering vines grown in the Lush Shallows.
lore.farworld.stonewood_sapling: A sapling that grows into a Stonewood tree when planted on Flowstone or Lush Flowstone.
lore.farworld.bloomed: A small, timid spider that can be befriended using a raw potato, which it bites into like an apple.
lore.farworld.soul_golem: A large construct that can be built using three Soul Steel blocks and a Shroomlight. It must be fueled using coal.
lore.farworld.brittle: A decrepit, crumbling skeleton from a corpse long dehydrated. Even so much as touching it makes you feel weak.
lore.farworld.dustbug: A larger Silverfish which will run away from you. If disturbed, it will send its brothers and sisters to fight you in schools.
enchantment.farworld.scything.desc: Negates mining speed decreases while in precision mode.
lore.farworld.scything: Negates mining speed decreases while in precision mode.
enchantment.farworld.attunement.desc: Allows the Wishbone to be attuned to a Lodestone.
lore.farworld.attunement: Allows the Wishbone to be attuned to a Lodestone.
advancement.farworld.friend_of_arthropod: Befriend a Bloomed by feeding it a potato
advancement.farworld.saw_it_all.desc: Find the Allsaw in a chest
advancement.farworld.black_light.desc: Open a portal to the Bystone by using an Echo Shard on a row of hanging Lanterns
Craft a Soul Steel Ingot using Iron, Quartz and Soul Sand
accessory.farworld.accessory_helmet_desc: §cHelmet Accessory: §7Can be applied to helmets by right-clicking
accessory.farworld.accessory_chestplate_: §cChestplate Accessory: §7Can be applied to chestplates by right-clicking
accessory.farworld.accessory_leggings_de: §cLegging Accessory: §7Can be applied to leggings by right-clicking
accessory.farworld.accessory_boots_descr: §cBoot Accessory: §7Can be applied to boots by right-clicking
